entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light wet snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late in the evening then light wet snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 February 2023
